name: Shooty Run
description:
Hi, this is platformer-puzzle game. You can use your parkour skills to navigate around and your logic to solve puzzles! This game is related to speedrunners too! You can open timer on settings and you will have a live timer wich starts when you start moving. After you can see your best time in levels(Press "esc" > choose levels) and compare it with your friends(You can navigate trough levels in levels menu)!

You can use "R" key to restart the current level.

 Game is still on progress, so feel free to give feedback! Your feedback is so important for me.
